definitions.title: Qal
definitions.body: Impf. [[יׇבוּס]] Ps 60:14 = Ps 108:13; 3 fs. [[תָּבוּס]] Pr 27:7, [[אָבוּס]] Is 63:6; sf. 3 s. [[אֲבוּסֶנּוּ]] Is 14:25; 1 pl. [[נׇבוּס]] Ps 44:6; —tread down, trample (of warriors), no obj. expr. Zec 10:5; id., fig. c. acc. (subj. ´[[י]], as warrior) Is 14:25 cf. Ps 60:14 = Ps 108:13, Is 63:6; (subj. men, with God's help) Ps 44:6; fig. = reject, loathe Pr 27:7.

definitions.title: Pol.
definitions.body: Pf. [[בּוֹסְסוּ]] Is 63:18; [[בּׂסְסוּ]] Je 12; 10—tread down in bad sense, subj. enemies of ´[[י]], obj. acc. Je 12:10 (in metaph.); = desecrate (obj. [[מקדשׁ]]) Is 63:18.

definitions.title: Hithpol.
definitions.body: Pt. f. [[מִתְבּוֹסֶסֶת]] Ez Eze 16:6, Eze 16:22—of the blind movements of infant's limbs, kick out (this way and that), fig. of Jerusalem.

definitions.title: Hoph.
definitions.body: Pt. [[מוּבָָס]] Is 14:19—pass. trodden down Is 14:19, of corpse, sim. of king of Babylon.
